COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e
STRING: As Torta sat across from me, I invited her to practice
today as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4
STRING: [Chris] “How about practicing again today, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Oh, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. So should we just head to a practice
room?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: [Torta] “Huh...? Oh, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. So should we just head to a practice
room?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2
STRING: I stood up to leave the cafeteria when someone called
out to me from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c
STRING: [Asino] “Hi, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, 'morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: [Asino] “I think you mean good afternoon...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: [Chris] “But you just woke up, didn't you Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298
STRING: [Asino] “How did you know...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ae
STRING: [Chris] “I know that much. So? What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e0
STRING: [Asino] “Oh, nothing really... But.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f6
STRING: As he said this, his gaze traveled to Torta behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x314
STRING: [Asino] “Are you two going to practice now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a
STRING: [Chris] “I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x348
STRING: [Asino] “So it's just as I suspected.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: [Chris] “Don't be so proud, anyone could have figured
that out...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e
STRING: I stopped myself from saying it wasn't decided yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39c
STRING: [Asino] “But I was right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b2
STRING: [Chris] “You seem strangely happy...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d0
STRING: [Asino] “No-no, it's nothing. I like how easy you are to
read.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f0
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry I'm so easy. If it's nothing, I'm going, okay?
I thought you had practice, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x418
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah. I'm here because I was a little worried
about you. But I'm relieved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe you should worry about yourself first?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46a
STRING: [Asino] “Hmm?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x498
STRING: I'm fine. Unlike you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I admit I'm not like you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4be
STRING: Asino was happy for some reason. He looked at Torta
and me one more time, then walked to the classroom
with a light wave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x500
STRING: [Chris] “What was that about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x516
STRING: I asked Torta, who hadn't spoken a single word yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53e
STRING: [Torta] “I don't know. Was he just happy things went
the way he thought?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e
STRING: Torta answered with the same disinterested tone she
always used when talking about Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x574
STRING: [Chris] “Regardless of what he says now, that was the
only choice at the time anyway. Asino's more childish
than you'd think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ba
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sure he... He thinks the same thing about
you, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d0
STRING: [Chris] “That is possible...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x602
STRING: [Torta] “I feel the same way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x618
STRING: [Chris] “By the way, who do you think is more childish?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64a
STRING: [Torta] “That's easy. You're both equally childish.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x660
STRING: Torta stated this as if it were totally obvious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x676
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69a
STRING: I wasn't totally satisfied with that, but I didn't have the
will to deny it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a6
STRING: We didn't have much time to waste, so we just headed
to the practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x724
STRING: Time flies when you're concentrating, and the next thing
I knew, I was sweaty and tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73a
STRING: The small windowless room messed with my sense of
time, and if I didn't look at the clock, it seemed like we
hadn't been practicing for very long.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76c
STRING: [Torta] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x782
STRING: Torta stretched her back where she stood and rolled
her shoulders many times, as if to lure me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ac
STRING: [Chris] “Good work.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7de
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, you too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f4
STRING: I didn't think there was anything special to say about
our performance, but Torta suddenly asked a question,
looking a little puzzled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x826
STRING: [Torta] “Umm, has your sound changed, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? My sound?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85a
STRING: [Torta] “I'm not sure why... But I kind of feel like it
changed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87a
STRING: [Chris] “How specifically?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ac
STRING: [Torta] “I don't know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c2
STRING: [Chris] “What's that about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f4
STRING: [Torta] “I don't know, that's why I asked.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90a
STRING: [Chris] “You've got it backwards. I asked because I don't
know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93c
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm... It's more of a feeling; not really
something that I can put into words.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95c
STRING: [Chris] “So you're saying I should know? Or that I should
explain?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98e
STRING: [Torta] “I guess you can't, Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a4
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's not that I can't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d6
STRING: [Torta] “Never mind. I don't really know, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ec
STRING: It was like Torta wasn't listening to a thing I said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f8
STRING: She wondered on her own, and answered on her own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa12
STRING: [Chris] “I don't care anyway...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa28
STRING: Music is a fickle thing in the first place; it can change
greatly based on the conditions or emotions of the day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa48
STRING: Pros are less influenced and are just more in control.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa54
STRING: The hurdle is very high, but we are all fundamentally
humans at heart, so we all have the potential.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa74
STRING: What's more, it can change depending not only on the
performer's mood, but also on the listener's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8a
STRING: It's necessary to value emotion, but it isn't very good to
let it lead you astray.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa0
STRING: [Chris] “Well, we have two days off starting tomorrow.
Hopefully you can explain it well then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: [Torta] “You plan on taking two days off...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf2
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...? Y-Yeah, that was the plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb24
STRING: [Torta] “Are you seriously motivated?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3a
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... I am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6c
STRING: [Torta] “So I'll ask you again. Do you plan on taking two
days off?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb82
STRING: [Chris] “God forbid.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba0
STRING: [Torta] “Of course I'll give you one day off. You can
choose which day you want.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc0
STRING: Her face was smiling, but was this a threat?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd6
STRING: [Chris] “Either one is fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbec
STRING: There was no difference in taking tomorrow off or the
day after.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf8
STRING: I thought it may have been easier to do it on the same
day of my practice with Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0e
STRING: I could rest all day, then play all day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1a
STRING: Or I could take two half-days off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc26
STRING: Either way, I'd lose a whole day of rest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3c
STRING: So, what to do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc64
STRING: [Torta] “Well, how about...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7a
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc98
STRING: [Torta] “Is Sunday alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcae
STRING: She said she was going to let me choose...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: I did say that either would be fine, though.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: [Chris] “But why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: [Torta] “No real reason.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfa
STRING: [Chris] “So... At your house again, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2c
STRING: [Torta] “About that, would your apartment be alright,
Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd42
STRING: [Chris] “I don't mind, but what about Ninna? I thought
she'd be happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7e
STRING: [Torta] “Listen. Let's say you come two weeks in a row
after not visiting for six months. It might seem that you
were just doing it to please her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9e
STRING: [Chris] “That may be true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd0
STRING: [Torta] “And she said you should come when you
wanted to, Chris. You know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf0
STRING: [Chris] “Got it... But, my apartment?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe22
STRING: [Torta] “I haven't been there at all lately. Don't you think
we could relax more than at the school? And you can
sleep in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe42
STRING: [Chris] “That is pretty appealing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe58
STRING: Also, Phorni would be happy to hear Torta was coming.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6e
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8c
STRING: [Torta] “Okay. So, after lunch? I'm sure you won't say
earlier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeac
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, bingo.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeca
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's go home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeee
STRING: The atmosphere was natural between us, just like when
we were kids.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefa
STRING: It made me strangely happy and I smiled in spite of
myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf06
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, let's go home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3c
STRING: Somehow everything, even what happened at the last
practice, seemed to be totally resolved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf52
STRING: When I thought about it, I had considered Torta as my
partner from the beginning; it just seemed natural.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf72
STRING: Trying to force myself to change that was probably just
a waste of time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf88
STRING: However...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf94
STRING: I wanted to make sure I maintained the distance
between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfaa
STRING: I couldn't get too close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb6
STRING: And I couldn't let anyone get hurt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: I thought about selfish things like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101e
STRING: As soon as we arrived at the practice room, Torta
quietly began getting ready.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102a
STRING: The strangely heavy atmosphere from last time still
hadn't totally dissipated.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1036
STRING: She said she felt relieved, but her questions and
dissatisfaction weren't completely gone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1068
STRING: [Torta] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107e
STRING: These normally innocuous words felt cold and
indifferent, though I may have been over-thinking it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, it's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10bc
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's start. From the beginning?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I'm ready any time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f0
STRING: [Torta] “Me too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1106
STRING: I looked her in the eyes and made to start playing, but I
had a strange feeling that our gazes weren't meeting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111c
STRING: Was she really looking at me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1128
STRING: Her gaze seemed to be fixed on something far away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113e
STRING: Even so, I pretended to look at her, and began playing
my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117e
STRING: It seemed a long time, but also a short one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118a
STRING: The next thing I knew, the hands of the clock were
pointing to the time we usually went home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11bc
STRING: [Torta] “Phew... I think that's all for today. Good work.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d2
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, you too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e8
STRING: I never had this problem before, but I really didn't know
what I should say to Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1208
STRING: Of course I didn't avoid our daily meetings in the
cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121e
STRING: She was my partner so I could talk to her about
practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122a
STRING: But when we were alone in a tiny room, practicing for
our own graduation recital, I didn't know what to say to
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1252
STRING: “How did it sound?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1266
STRING: I knew that best myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: Even if I said something like that, it would just be a
superficial conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127e
STRING: Though I was afraid of that, I was driven by an
obsession that I had to say something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1294
STRING: Then Torta suddenly said something strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12bc
STRING: [Torta] “Your sound doesn't change, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d2
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1304
STRING: [Torta] “Nothing... I was just thinking that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131a
STRING: [Chris] “It doesn't change? The sound of my Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134c
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. I thought it was something that would
normally change over the years, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136c
STRING: [Chris] “So are you saying that I haven't grown up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x139e
STRING: [Torta] “Not quite...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b4
STRING: [Chris] “N-Not quite?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e6
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, that's not what I mean... The nuance is
totally different. The words 'grown up' just don't say it. I
think your skills have improved a lot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: [Chris] “So what doesn't change?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1442
STRING: [Torta] “You ask me what, but I'm not sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1458
STRING: Torta tilted her head, as if she were really troubled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1464
STRING: It seemed that she truly didn't know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1470
STRING: Even if I kept asking, a clear answer probably wouldn't
be forthcoming.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1486
STRING: [Chris] “Well... If I haven't changed, there's no real
problem, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c2
STRING: [Torta] “I guess not. I just noticed it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d8
STRING: [Chris] “Now that you mention it, I'm interested. Do you
mean my tone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1514
STRING: [Torta] “That's not wrong... But maybe it's something
more fundamental.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152a
STRING: [Chris] “The difference between individual Fortelle
performers' sounds is considerable. But at the same
time, that's what makes each player's sound unique and
distinctive.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1554
STRING: That was part of a lecture I attended long ago and I
didn't remember the exact details, but I didn't think I
was that far off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1586
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, I did learn that. But about not changing...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a6
STRING: [Chris] “I guess it doesn't change fundamentally. It's
something internal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d8
STRING: [Torta] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160a
STRING: [Torta] “So you're the same now as you were before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1620
STRING: [Chris] “I won't change so easily.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1636
STRING: After slightly too long a silence, Torta muttered while
laughing resignedly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1668
STRING: [Torta] “Well, whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167e
STRING: [Chris] “What's that about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b0
STRING: [Torta] “Nothing. Look, it's late so let's clean up and go
home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c6
STRING: Torta said this a little cheerfully, different from her
recent attitude.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e4
STRING: [Torta] “Ask me again any time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fa
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1718
STRING: [Torta] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, it's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1760
STRING: [Torta] “Hee-hee. I'm ready to go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1776
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I'll hurry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c4
STRING: Reaching the spot where we usually parted ways, Torta
called out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ec
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, you really can ask me again any time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1802
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1842
STRING: She gave a refreshing smile, like she had let something
go.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1858
STRING: I wanted to make sure I maintained distance between
us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186e
STRING: I couldn't get too close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x187a
STRING: I couldn't hurt Torta anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188e
STRING: Thinking about these things, I turned in the opposite
direction from her, and started walking home.
